author: pkluegl
msg: - fixed several bugs for inner mark in greedy iteration
- added hotfix for failed match in greedy iteration in a wildcard lookahead -> should not revolve to successful match, but should end the lookahead
- added tests, one still fails (right to left matching)

author: rombert
msg: SLING-3136 - Configure -> Convert to Bundle/Content Package project
should not assume the project is Maven-based
ConvertToBundleAction now considers all Java projects as candidates,
excluding the ones which already have the sling.bundle facet.

author: rombert
msg: SLING-3136 - Configure -> Convert to Bundle/Content Package project
should not assume the project is Maven-based
Use the standard naming of 'Sling Content Project' and 'Sling Bundle
